name: DigitZ - Brain-building fun!
description:
"Digitz is a fun Tetris-type game, with sneaky math practice thrown in. It is surprisingly fun, and kids will come away with quicker math facts recall. A win-win for parents and kids.
Rating: 4 stars (out of 4)"
-- USA Today

"Digitz is an addictive game that offers a great amount of challenge and fun for any player. Whether you’re a child in school just learning basic arithmetic or a graduate student finishing up calculus, anyone is capable of enjoying this game."
-- Greg Young, AppAdvice

A HIGHLY ADDICTIVE NUMBERS game where you’re racing to eliminate falling tiles before they reach the top of the screen.

FALLING TILES ADD UP TO FUN!
The falling tiles have numbers on them and to eliminate them you have to choose the ones that add up to your target number. But there’s strategy involved because you can’t use up too many small numbers or there won’t be enough to beat the level. Your mind has to move in many directions to keep ahead of the game!

YOU SET THE PACE
You can play DigitZ as a leisurely game or you can up the intensity. Choose from two different types of play, each with three tiers of difficulty and ten levels in each tier. Each game also has three game modes leading to dozens of game combinations of varying complexity and difficulty -- all fun.

For the avid gamer there is also a CAMPAIGN mode so you can march through all the levels in order. Or play in MARATHON mode where you can’t stop until the game is won or over.

Gain BONUS ADVANTAGES that can give you the edge in completing a level. But choose carefully—not every advantage helps in the same way!

STYLE YOUR TILES
Add even more interest and challenge to your game by choosing from many different TILE SETS. Some tiles sets make the game more challenging.
